profile_summary:
Mid-Level Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building robust applications within healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **C#**, **.NET**, **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **DynamoDB**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, with strong capabilities in **React** for frontend development. Adept in cloud services including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, as well as infrastructure management with **Terraform**. Experienced with Agile methodologies and behavior-driven development using **Gherkin** and **SpecFlow**. 
In addition to backend systems, I hold hands-on expertise in **Python** and have developed applications leveraging **Flutter**. Proven track record of delivering AI/ML-infused solutions for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in deploying microservices and managing CI/CD pipelines.
